posts-list.description: Returns all the posts belonging to a feed, folder or source with various filters applied

parameters.name: parentType
parameters.description: The type (source, folder, feed) to retrieve posts for

parameters.name: parentID
parameters.description: The ID of the parent type (feedID or folderID); optional in case of 'source'

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: The amount of records per page to retrieve

parameters.name: showOnlyUnread
parameters.description: Whether to only retrieve unread posts - 'true' or 'false' - optional (default: false)

parameters.name: searchFilter
parameters.description: An optional search filter to apply

parameters.name: flagColor
parameters.description: The ID of a flag color to apply as a filter
